body: Github hates freedom and refuses to trigger our builds. We've already created at least one new PR in an attempt to get the builds triggering again, and the only thing that was broken in the last successful build was linting (which I just added an ignore comment for since the vendor built files aren't meant to be handled by humans). So I'm going to just merge this.
